html: Yesterday I reintroduced No Budget, No Pay. Congress is the only place in America where you can get paid for showing up, but not doing your work. I'd rather reward members for good behavior, but the reality is when you take away their pay, Congress finds a way to do its job.
text: Yesterday I reintroduced No Budget, No Pay. Congress is the only place in America where you can get paid for showing up, but not doing your work. I'd rather reward members for good behavior, but the reality is when you take away their pay, Congress finds a way to do its job.

html: Now that the House has done its job and passed bills to reopen the government, the Senate should follow suit. Congress should never let the government shut down. America is the greatest nation on earth, and it is embarrassing we are so poorly managed.

In 2017, Tennessee individual market insurers were among the most profitable in the country (average simple loss ratio 74%)

In 2018, average TN benchmark plan nevertheless increased 56%

It's no wonder 2019 premiums are dropping
